data.name: Sample - McAfee Mvision Insights - 1.1.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "McAfee Mvision Insights" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Get All Campaigns Detected
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all detected campaigns from McAfee Mvision Insight based on the input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: McAfee Mvision Insights: Get All Campaigns Detected

workflows.name: Get All IOC List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all IOC from McAfee Mvision Insight based on the input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: McAfee Mvision Insights: Get All IOC List

workflows.name: Get Campaign IOCs
workflows.description: Retrieves IOCs information about a specific campaign from McAfee Mvision Insights based on the Campaign ID you have specified.

arguments.title: McAfee Mvision Insights: Get Campaign IOCs

workflows.name: Get Related Samples
workflows.description: Returns a list of samples related to provided sample

workflows.name: Get IOC Details
workflows.description: Retrieves information about a specific IOC from McAfee Mvision Insights based on the IOC ID you have specified.

arguments.title: McAfee Mvision Insights: Get IOC Details

workflows.name: Get IOC Campaigns
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all campaigns for an specific IOC from McAfee Mvision Insights based on the IOC ID you have specified.

arguments.title: McAfee Mvision Insights: Get IOC Campaigns

workflows.name: Get Campaign Relationship IOCs
workflows.description: Retrieves a relationship campaigns for an IOCs from McAfee Mvision Insights based on the Campaign ID you have specified.

arguments.title: McAfee Mvision Insights: Get Campaign Relationship IOCs

workflows.name: Get Campaign Details
workflows.description: Retrieves information about a specific campaign from McAfee Mvision Insights based on the Campaign ID you have specified.

arguments.title: McAfee Mvision Insights: Get Campaign Details

workflows.name: Get Artefacts
workflows.description: Retrieves information about a specific artefacts from McAfee Mvision Insights based on the Hash type and Hash value you have specified.

workflows.name: Get All Campaigns List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all campaigns from McAfee Mvision Insight based on the input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: McAfee Mvision Insights: Get All Campaigns List

workflows.name: Get Campaign Relationship Galaxies
workflows.description: Retrieves a relationship campaigns for an galaxies from McAfee Mvision Insights based on the Campaign ID you have specified.

arguments.title: McAfee Mvision Insights: Get Campaign Relationship Galaxies

workflows.name: Get All InSight Events List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all events from McAfee Mvision Insight related to local IoC sighting

arguments.title: McAfee Mvision Insights: Get All Events List

workflows.name: Get All Events List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all events from McAfee Mvision Insight based on the input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: McAfee Mvision Insights: Get All Events List

workflows.name: Get IOC Relationship Campaigns
workflows.description: Retrieves a relationship IOC for an campaigns from McAfee Mvision Insights based on the IOC ID you have specified.

arguments.title: McAfee Mvision Insights: Get IOC Relationship Campaigns

workflows.name: Get All Galaxies List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all galaxies from McAfee Mvision Insight based on the input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: McAfee Mvision Insights: Get All Galaxies List

workflows.name: Get Campaign Galaxies
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all galaxies for an specific campaign from McAfee Mvision Insights based on the Campaign ID you have specified.

arguments.title: McAfee Mvision Insights: Get Campaign Galaxies
